1706766 THE PRESIDENT' S EMOLUMENTS AND PENSION ACT, 1951
ACT NO. 30 OF 1951 AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE EMOLUMENTS OF THE PRESIDENT AND FORPENSION TO 13th May, 1951.
1291265 1Short title. This Act may be called the President' s Emoluments and Pension Act, 1951.
1453180 1AEmoluments of the President. There shall be paid to the President by way of emoluments twenty thousand rupees per mensem.

874977 1] Pension to retiring Presidents. There shall be paid to every person who ceases to hold office as President, either by the expiration of his term of office or by resignation of his office, a pension of 6 one lakh twenty thousand rupees per annum for the remainder of his life. 7
